mapper.select: select L.ALBUM_NUM, L.ALBUM_NAME, L.ALBUM_CONTENTS, P.PAGE_HTML from ALBUMLIST L, Page P where L.ALBUM_NUM = P.ALBUM_NUM and P.PAGE_NUM = 1 order by L.Album_num desc

select L.ALBUM_NUM, L.ALBUM_NAME, L.ALBUM_CONTENTS, P.PAGE_HTML from ALBUMLIST L, Page P where L.ALBUM_NUM = P.ALBUM_NUM and L.ALBUM_WRITER = #{ALBUM_WRITER} and L.album_openrange = 1 and P.PAGE_NUM = 1 order by L.Album_num desc
